data.eml:eml: Five new species of cotylean flatworms (Platyhelminthes: Polycladida) from the wider Caribbean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolaños, Marcela, Quiroga, Sigmer Y., Litvaitis, Marian K. (2007): Five new species of cotylean flatworms (Platyhelminthes: Polycladida) from the wider Caribbean. Zootaxa 1650: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273970
